true.prompt:

You are exhausted and have a big meeting tomorrow. What do you do?
outcomes:
You decide to let her cry but concerned neighbors call the cops. 
They understand but all the ruckus makes it hard for you to fall back asleep. 
You oversleep your alarm missing your meeting.

You go to your baby and pick her up from the crib. 
You sigh knowing you will do terribly in your meeting tomorrow and it will affect your job performance.
The nanny arrives in time for you to get a good night's sleep
